channel.title: Divinisation client V1.1 R4 edition editing
channel.description:
Hey, I'd like a little info on
1. Changing shop titles, npc names, and shop contents 2. Assigning shop interfaces to npc's 3. Adding teleport commands or commands like ::runes 4. Changing the ranking system (such as 0 for player 1 for member 2 for donor 3 for mod 4 for admin and 5 for owner) 5. Changing the welcome message 6. Making items spawn in certain areas 7. Finally making NPC's say certain things like "Welcome to Devils Domain!"

item.title: Divinisation client V1.1 R4 edition editing
item.dc:creator: @Adam_Devils_domain_o Adam| Devils domain owner
item.description:
@Adam_Devils_domain_o wrote:

Hey, I’d like a little info on

  1. Changing shop titles, npc names, and shop contents
  2. Assigning shop interfaces to npc’s
  3. Adding teleport commands or commands like ::runes
  4. Changing the ranking system (such as 0 for player 1 for member 2 for donor 3 for mod 4 for admin and 5 for owner)
  5. Changing the welcome message
  6. Making items spawn in certain areas
  7. Finally making NPC’s say certain things like “Welcome to Devils Domain!”

Read full topic
item.source: Divinisation client V1.1 R4 edition editing
